all right this resolution is recognizing
and honoring peppers and fries for their
contribution to the greater Longfellow
neighborhood and the City of
Minneapolis whereas peppers and Fries a
much-loved restaurant in the Cooper
neighborhood of Ward 12 on Lake
Street and has served our community
since its opening in
2015 and whereas peppers and Fries was
established by Steve and Marie Fus an
incredibly dynamic fatherdaughter duo
who made high quality food from scratch
the Cornerstone of their business and
whereas the peppers and Fries menu is an
Innovative Collision of burgers and
burritos which have excited the taste
buds of neighbors and Foodies alike and
whereas peppers and Fries commitment to
our community extended to hosting events
being a vibrant social and Social Hub
and creating an ideal Ambiance to enjoy

Burger Battle and the peppers juicy
burger has been awarded Bon Appetit
eater and thrillist top Twin Cities
juicy and

and Fries will continue their connection

selections to various events and

down
here Steve Frias is ready for

lasting impact on the East Lake Street

this resolution as an expression of
